name: tamarack
description: Default paths and error pages for uri:s.

scripts.start-dev: LOG_LEVEL=debug PORTILLO_CLUSTER=active APPLICATIONS_API_HOST=api.kth.se APPLICATIONS_API_KEY=1234 DOMAIN_OWNERSHIP_VERIFICATION_FILE=verified.txt DOMAIN_OWNERSHIP_VERIFICATION_FILE_CONTENT=verified PORT=3000 nodemon app.js
scripts.test-integration-in-docker: ID=$(docker build -q .) && LOCAL_IMAGE_ID=$ID docker-compose -f docker-compose-integration-tests.yml up --abort-on-container-exit --always-recreate-deps
scripts.test-unit-in-docker: ID=$(docker build -q .) && LOCAL_IMAGE_ID=$ID docker-compose -f docker-compose-unit-tests.yml up --abort-on-container-exit --always-recreate-deps
